import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{fetchEvents}from'../services/api';import AboutSection from'./Sections/AboutSection';import ContactSection from'./Sections/ContactSection';import QASection from'./Sections/QASection';import Slider from'react-slick';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const{t}=useTranslation();const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const getEvents=async()=>{try{const data=await fetchEvents();setEvents(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching events:',error);}};getEvents();},[]);const handleViewDetails=id=>{navigate(`/event/${id}`);};const sliderSettings={dots:true,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,autoplay:true,autoplaySpeed:3000,arrows:true};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"events-slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:t('home.sections.eventsSlider.title')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...sliderSettings,children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slider-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image// Ensure your events have an image property
,alt:event.name,className:"event-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slider-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[t('home.sections.eventsSlider.date'),": ",new Date(event.dateOfEvent).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleViewDetails(event._id),children:t('home.sections.eventsSlider.moreDetails')})]})]},event._id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"event-list",children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image,alt:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:new Date(event.dateOfEvent).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleViewDetails(event._id),children:t('home.sections.eventsSlider.moreDetails')})]})]},event._id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AboutSection,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QASection,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactSection,{})]});}export default Home;
